faq.question: What Auflösung can I achieve from Midjourney PNGs?
faq.answer: Starting from Midjourney's PNG export (typically 1024x1024 or higher for v5), we can upscale up to 8x, achieving resolutions up to 8192x8192 pixels.

faq.question: Which browsers support AVIF Midjourney Bilder?
